comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
President Woodrow Wilson's daughter, Jessie Woodrow Wilson, married Francis Bowes Sayre in a White House ceremony, on November 25, 1913. On December 1, 1913, the bridal couple embarked on a honeymoon voyage to Europe, aboard the North German Lloyd vessel, "Vulcan," with Captain Ludwig Franck.

Another Bain/LOC photo of Sayre with Captain Franck:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4586898878/in/set-72157603624867509/]
